visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the title and axis labels, with a font size of 14px. Use a light gray color (#CCCCCC) for the grid lines. Data series: The series should be named 'Temperature' and contain the data provided in the JavaScript code. Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color (#F0F0F0), enable zooming on the x-axis, and position the zoom reset button at the top-left corner of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is a light gray (#F0F0F0). The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a dark blue color (#003366) and a font size of 14px. The grid lines on both axes are styled with a light gray color (#CCCCCC). The data series is named 'Temperature' and contains the monthly temperature data. The series color is a gradient from blue (#003366) to green (#33CC66). Additionally, the chart allows zooming on the x-axis, and the zoom reset button is positioned at the top-left corner of the chart.
